overview: The Cambridge Hotel is infamous in Newcastle for being one of the best live music venues in the area. It is also known in recent history for having a negative reputation, where lots of fights and violence would take place. This not only affected the night life, but also the local music scene. With a change in ownership, style and few other things, The Cambridge reinvented itself into the award-winning venue, hosting some of the biggest bands Australia and the world have to offer.
tagline: Does the public opinion change the perception or does the perception change the public opinion?
title: Transforming The Cambridge
